text:
Hactar | London, UK | ONSITE, FULL-TIME | http://hactar.is

We’re looking for a midweight Python web developer with experience with Flask and Django / Wagtail.

We’re a web agency that works almost exclusively with charities, non-profits, NGOs and social enterprises. This is a rare opportunity to use your skills on projects that have a real, meaningful impact on people’s lives.

Email jobs@hactar.is if you’re interested, or if you know someone else who might be please point them at this.
